#text=The other day I noticed it was getting a little wild .
#text=I thought to myself , '' `` It is time for a hair cut ! '' ''
#text=I have heard of a great salon in town called Cuts-R-Us and thought I would give it a try .
#text=I looked up the phone number , and I gave them a call .
#text=A girl named Gina answered the phone and asked how she could help .
#text=I told her that I need an appointment for a hair cut .
#text=We set the appointment for 2:00 the next day .
#text=This is exciting to try a new salon !
#text=The next day rolled around and I went to Cuts-R-Us at about 1:45 , it never hurts to be a little early .
#text=Gina greeted me and said that Shelly would be cutting my hair .
#text=Shelly was just finishing up with a client and cleaning her area .
#text=Shelly called me over and we discussed what style I would like .
#text=I just wanted a trim with some layers .
#text=Shelly put a cape around my neck and adjusted my chair .
#text=She got a water bottle and sprayed my hair ; it is easier to cut wet hair .
#text=She then cut , cut , and cut some more .
#text=Shelly blow dried my hair and styled it for me .
#text=She used a little brush to get small stray hairs off of my face , and then she removed my cape .
#text=I went up to the cash register where Gina complemented my new cut .
#text=I paid for my hair cut and left a little tip for Shelly .
#text=Sometimes , when someone does a good job , I like to give them a little extra to show my appreciation .
#text=I enjoyed the services at Cuts-R-Us , and I love my new cut !
